_source.text: 129 people on 4 train services in the 2 hour peak is around 33 people a train - that's called a bus load - and a train that short is NOT environmentally better than a bus, because trains are heavier and consume more fuel - that's why a general rule of thumb is you need 3 bus loads to make a train start to be worthwhile.

_source.text: AEG Allgemeine Elektricitäts-Gesellschaft (which is German for General Electricity Company), or AEG as it is better known, was founded in Berlin in 1883 as a manufacturer of electrical products such as motors or generators..
